DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study validation Electroencephalograph base algorithm detection onset deterioration Acute Ischemic Stroke Comparison NIHSS .
DOC.brief_title: Validation Electroencephalograph Based Algorithm Detection Onset Deterioration Acute Ischemic Stroke Comparison NIHSS
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion criterion study population 1 . Age > 18 year old . 2 . Acute stroke symptom onset within 2 week inclusion , proximate event possible long neurological deterioration ( ΔNIHSS > 4 ) symptom onset inclusion . 3 . Patients TIA last least 5 minute minor acute ischemic stroke ( NIHSS < 4 time enrolment ) 4 . More 3 following : Blood pressure > 140/90 unknown , Irregular heartbeat , Atrial Fibrillation , Smoker , Cholesterol > 240 unknown , Has Diabetes , Lack physical exercise , Overweight , Has Stroke family OR 4 6 following : Blood pressure 120-139/80-89 , Unknown Irregular heartbeat , Atrial Fibrillation , Trying quit smoking , Cholesterol 200-239 , Borderline Diabetes , Some exercise , Slightly overweight , Not sure Stroke occur family Exclusion criterion study population 1 . Intracranial hemorrhage admission CT. 2 . Previous major hemispheric stroke . 3 . Patients pure sensory symptom , 4 . Significant movement disorder . 5 . Local skull skin affliction prevents sensor application . 6 . Any known condition opinion investigator may interfere protocol implementation .
